content: That's really helpful, thanks! I've been experimenting with different props and styling ideas, and I think I need to invest in some traditional Korean ceramics and wooden utensils to add more authenticity to my photos. By the way, speaking of Korean food, I've been going to this amazing Korean restaurant near my office at least once a week, and I'm obsessed with their spicy bibimbap and Japchae noodles. Have you heard of any popular Korean restaurants or dishes that I should try?
